rules: 1. Try to be inclusive and respectful of people with different lifestyles and ideologies
1.1 Feel free to discuss aspects of these as long as it's made in a respectful and understanding manner
2. Expressions of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia and other forms of bigotry are not welcome
3. Don't post NSFW content outside channels designated 'NSFW allowed'
4. Be mindful of spoilers. Put your spoiler text in between `||` and `||` characters
5. Following the standard Discord terms of service still apply (no illegal stuff, no unauthorized sharing of copyrighted content, etc)
